device_verification.safety: Performed minimal reversible changes under 1/1/5/2 and 1/1/5/1/6 only. Strictly avoided any changes under 1/1/5/1/15; read-only allowed there. All changes were verified live and reverted to baseline (ONT scheduler 50Mbps; UNI queue 0 weight 34; UNI upstream-queue 0/4/5 profiles 100Mbps; queue-stats-off).

attempt_results.result: Error: QOS MGT error 46 : Q Sharing can only be enabled on ONT
attempt_results.note: Not applicable on UNI interface on this platform

attempt_results.result: Success: upstream-queue 4 weight set to 7; verified via info; reverted to 5
attempt_results.note: Upstream queue weight configurable on UNI for queue 4

attempt_results.command: configure qos interface 1/1/5/1/6/1/1 upstream-queue 5 bandwidth-profile name:GPONqpp200Mbps
attempt_results.result: Success: upstream-queue 5 profile changed to 200Mbps; verified via info; reverted to 100Mbps
attempt_results.note: Upstream queue bandwidth-profile configurable on UNI for queue 5

changes.reason: Expanded CLI command syntax from placeholder to full syntax per help.txt
Aligned fields with help: removed invalid choices for numeric queue counts, added autoschedule boolean, set defaults for scheduler-mode and ds-schedule-tag, fixed queue-stats-on description

example_data_source: Captured from live Nokia ISAM device DS-LIN-TEST-01 using single commands only: 'info configure qos interface' and minimal toggles 'configure qos interface 1/1/5/2/1/1/1 [no] queue-stats-on'. Inventory banners were stripped.
